title: Not encrypted
text: This is bit difficult to understand let alone explain, but due to recent event I found out among us is not encrypted which basically means it is much much easier for hackers to access you ip and or address, this happened to me the other day and I had to delete my account because of that, most games are encrypted which is what should be, but among us isn‚Äôt so there are hackers left and right and it makes it extremely difficult to play the game, it‚Äôs a fun game and I have made friends on it, but it needs to be encrypted.

title: Answering some reviews and giving some advice üòÑ
text: Without a doubt, this game is fantastic. üòÄ I really don‚Äôt care üòÑabout the quick chat and all of that because I got really used to it. I just want to clear things out with fellow crewmates: If a dead üíÄbody is reported and the reporter says a certain player killed the victim over and over again, BELIEVE THEM. üòìPLEASE üôè. Not trying to be rude or mean, but the people I play a game with are SO STUPID üôÑ. I tell them that a player is an imposter, but they FreAKiNG voted ME out! (Me, out of all players, ME when I witnessed a KILL.) I was so madü§¨, needless to say. This happened multiple times, so I am very annoyed at the crewmates horrible detective skills üòë. Anyways, moving on. My fellow impostors, QUIT trying to get your teammates out! üò†That is just so sad üòû to the impostors who waited so long to be an impostor. Oh, so crewmates beware: a player who knows who are the impostors with no evidence are very suspicious ü§® and are most likely an impostor. (If you are a crewmate, please don‚Äôt accuse random players of being an impostor.) Okay, time to reply to some reviews. First of all, stop complaining about the quick chat. Get used to it.ü´§ It‚Äôs really not that hard‚Ä¶ Next: yes I know. Among us is not what it used to be a couple years back. Still, this doesn‚Äôt change the fact that it‚Äôs still the same game, with the exact same format. (Ignore the quick chat ü´•) Again, stop complaining, players. I would just like to ask for a favor from all among us players - if possible, can some people start playing the hide and seek game? Without just choosing SKELD? Mira, Polus, Airship, and Fungle are nearly bare‚Ä¶Now, for a quick talk with the developers. There either are some creepy hackers in among us, or there is a glitch gone wrong. There was lots of times bodies would be left somewhere: when I tried to report them, the button didn‚Äôt work. I was quick to call a meeting; guess what. It didn‚Äôt work either. I eventually died, so I immediately left the lobby - concerned about getting hacked. Also, there really are no name players with a scary color on them - yellow with a shade of red. I don‚Äôt understand how this is possible, but I was really scared of those two players so I left the game (again). Oh, and those players only appeared in the emergency meeting‚Ä¶ P.S. Crewmates. Seriously. Stop. Voting. Red. Red is not always impostor, geniuses. (Red‚Äôs my fav color, but in some games I can‚Äôt use it without risking the votes.üó≥Ô∏è) If you read this message fully, congratulations. You have patience, though you probably are just bored üòë. ü´†Hope to see more hide and seek players! üòÄJust wanting to ask, what are your fav among us bean costume?

title: Has been awesome!
text: I love among us. My best friend and his mom play together! Although, a couple years ago, me and my mom were extremely offended by a guy rage quitting and saying a curse word that is racist at least several times. I love the new update of sentence starters, but they could at least bring back the whatever you could say, and if anyone decided to say offensive things, the could tag it out. Just a suggestion! Thanks overall!
